6032h, 4370m, 27625e, 20200w xdb-
(Argent Ward): Mithridates says, "Calad."
6032h, 4370m, 27625e, 20200w xdb-
A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. A small wooden lottery box stands here. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  Reonna is here. Kei Greywards is here. Ormand is here. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

PUBLIC NEWS #19427                                      (04/23/2014 at 20:49)  
From   : Grand Master of Combat, Deladan Seir-Aristata
To     : The Clan of Excidium
Subject: Apologies
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Over a century ago, I wronged your village. And I am sorry for my actions back then. I can only hope that you find it within yourselves to allow me to freely walk your village once more.




Deladan Seir-Aristata

Penned by my hand on the 24th of Sarapin, in the year 653 AF.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. A small wooden lottery box stands here. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  Reonna is here. Kei Greywards is here. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Ormand is here.

The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. The Targossian barracks (indoors).

North of New Thera (road).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. The ground is slick with ice. A polished wooden sign is nailed to a small tree here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A dyed blue poster bearing the title "Ty Beirdd Lottery" has been hung here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. Coiling green tendrils ensnare a scattered pile of pale, humanoid bones. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Flapping its massive wings, a dire bat flies overhead. A brightly coloured hermit crab scuttles back and forth, clacking his claws. There are 2 small black cobras here. A short length of rope lies on the ground, one end of which is tied to a lump of cheese. There are 2 pinches of ground realgar in 2 groups here. There are 5 aurum flakes in 3 groups here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A spinning disc of deep claret crystal floats here. A spinning pentagon carved from a cloudy white crystal floats here. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 4 pieces of bayberry bark in 2 groups here. There are 7 pieces of kelp in 5 groups here. There are 2 goldenseal roots in 2 groups here. There are 8 bloodroot leaves in 6 groups here. There are 6 magnesium chips in 3 groups here. There are 6 potash crystals in 4 groups here. There are 2 ferrum flakes in a group here. A smudge of brick-red cinnabar dusts the ground here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A dead black cobra is here. There are 5 pieces of irid moss in 5 groups here. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby.  Razha is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He is rapidly swinging a sword above his head. Sempai Daslin Esben-Gunnar is here. Atalkez al'Dejan, the Damned is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right.
You see exits leading north, southeast, south, southwest, and northwest.

North of New Thera (road).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. The ground is slick with ice. A polished wooden sign is nailed to a small tree here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A dyed blue poster bearing the title "Ty Beirdd Lottery" has been hung here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. Coiling green tendrils ensnare a scattered pile of pale, humanoid bones. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. Flapping its massive wings, a dire bat flies overhead. A brightly coloured hermit crab scuttles back and forth, clacking his claws. There are 2 small black cobras here. A short length of rope lies on the ground, one end of which is tied to a lump of cheese. There are 2 pinches of ground realgar in 2 groups here. There are 5 aurum flakes in 3 groups here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A spinning disc of deep claret crystal floats here. A spinning pentagon carved from a cloudy white crystal floats here. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 4 pieces of bayberry bark in 2 groups here. There are 7 pieces of kelp in 5 groups here. There are 2 goldenseal roots in 2 groups here. There are 8 bloodroot leaves in 6 groups here. There are 6 magnesium chips in 3 groups here. There are 6 potash crystals in 4 groups here. There are 2 ferrum flakes in a group here. A smudge of brick-red cinnabar dusts the ground here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A dead black cobra is here. There are 5 pieces of irid moss in 5 groups here. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby.  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Razha is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Sempai Daslin Esben-Gunnar is here. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. 6032h, 4473m, 27625e, 20195w cexkdb-
He is a human, possessed of a lanky figure and tall stature. Deep, blue eyes reveal an ever-present wariness that adds to his cautious and controlled bearing. Swept back across his head, a wave of dark hair crests his noble profile. Around his left ear, where the hair has been shaved to a reveal a dark tuft of scalp, a striking tattoo winds its inky way down his neck in a slash of deep colour. Thick, boldface letters are inked on the knuckles of either hand in heavy strokes of black. Complementary pinup style tattoos adorn the backs of each hand showing coquettish figures, one done in striking red and embellished with gold flakes, and the other a work of smooth curving lines and soft colours. He is wearing a blood ruby gold stud through his right ear, a blood ruby gold stud through his left ear, a small steel hoop accented by a ruby ball through his lower lip, a Mojushaine ring of the Striking Fist, a bone encrusted blackened steel hoop through his right nostril, a canvas backpack, a pair of black dragon-leather trousers, a comfortable light blue shirt, combat boots of titanium and black leather, a tarnished hoop of sinuously twisted silver through his septum, a pair of fire-forged knuckles, a bag of stasis, a Sempai's bronze linen robes, a suit of leather armour bearing the arms of Daslin, a hunter's belt, and a pair of Mayan Bracelets. He walks with the truefavour of Vastar.

North of New Thera (road).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. The ground is slick with ice. A polished wooden sign is nailed to a small tree here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A dyed blue poster bearing the title "Ty Beirdd Lottery" has been hung here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. Coiling green tendrils ensnare a scattered pile of pale, humanoid bones. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. Flapping its massive wings, a dire bat flies overhead. A brightly coloured hermit crab scuttles back and forth, clacking his claws. A small black cobra is flaring its hood here. A short length of rope lies on the ground, one end of which is tied to a lump of cheese. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A spinning disc of deep claret crystal floats here. A spinning pentagon carved from a cloudy white crystal floats here. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A dead black cobra is here. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Quite innocently, a banana peel lies on the ground.  Razha is here. Ormand is here. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Sempai Daslin Esben-Gunnar is here.
You see exits leading north, southeast, south, southwest, and northwest.

Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A polished wooden sign is nailed to a small tree here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A dyed blue poster bearing the title "Ty Beirdd Lottery" has been hung here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. Coiling green tendrils ensnare a scattered pile of pale, humanoid bones. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. Flapping its massive wings, a dire bat flies overhead. A brightly coloured hermit crab scuttles back and forth, clacking his claws. There are 2 small black cobras here. A short length of rope lies on the ground, one end of which is tied to a lump of cheese. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A spinning disc of deep claret crystal floats here. A spinning pentagon carved from a cloudy white crystal floats here. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A dead black cobra is here. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Quite innocently, a banana peel lies on the ground.  Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands.
You see exits leading north, southeast, south, southwest, and northwest.

North of New Thera (road).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A polished wooden sign is nailed to a small tree here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A dyed blue poster bearing the title "Ty Beirdd Lottery" has been hung here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. Coiling green tendrils ensnare a scattered pile of pale, humanoid bones. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. Flapping its massive wings, a dire bat flies overhead. A brightly coloured hermit crab scuttles back and forth, clacking his claws. There are 2 small black cobras here. A short length of rope lies on the ground, one end of which is tied to a lump of cheese. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A spinning disc of deep claret crystal floats here. A spinning pentagon carved from a cloudy white crystal floats here. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A dead black cobra is here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Quite innocently, a banana peel lies on the ground. There are 2 pieces of bayberry bark in a group here. There are 2 pieces of irid moss in 2 groups here. There are 2 pieces of kelp in a group here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here.  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. The soul of Gyrth roams the land, bodiless. Sempai Daslin Esben-Gunnar is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form.
You see exits leading north, southeast, south, southwest, and northwest.

The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Quite innocently, a banana peel lies on the ground. There are 2 pieces of bayberry bark in a group here. There are 2 pieces of irid moss in 2 groups here. There are 2 pieces of kelp in a group here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here.  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Sempai Daslin Esben-Gunnar is here. The Targossian barracks (indoors).

Covered in grime, a one-handed atavian boy playfully chases his friend around the barracks. A gilt-framed portrait of Draekar hangs upon a wall. Carefully buffed to a pristine shine, a steel strongchest rests upon the ground. Shining in silver armour, Lady Talarna, Paladin of Learning, stands here deep in thought. There are 5 Brighthold watchmen here. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. Waddling nearby, a desert hedgehog snuffles eagerly at a scruffy girl's feet. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. A steel-plated chair is here.

South Mirror Isle.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A dwarven labourer works quietly nearby. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground.

6032h, 4444m, 27623e, 20200w cexkdb-
The Plaza of the Faithful.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A rune resembling a horse has been sketched into the ground here. A weary soldier watches the world with tired eyes. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Luminous shadows coalesce in fiery splendour around the golden Pyre of the Faithful. An heraldic pennon flies here, bearing the city arms of Targossas. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. In threat of being stepped upon, a diminutive tortoise cautiously rests here.
You see exits leading north, east, and west.

North of New Thera (road).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A polished wooden sign is nailed to a small tree here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A dyed blue poster bearing the title "Ty Beirdd Lottery" has been hung here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. Coiling green tendrils ensnare a scattered pile of pale, humanoid bones. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. Flapping its massive wings, a dire bat flies overhead. A brightly coloured hermit crab scuttles back and forth, clacking his claws. There are 2 small black cobras here. A short length of rope lies on the ground, one end of which is tied to a lump of cheese. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A dead black cobra is here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Quite innocently, a banana peel lies on the ground. There are 2 pieces of bayberry bark in a group here. There are 2 pieces of irid moss in 2 groups here. There are 2 pieces of kelp in a group here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here.  Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Sempai Daslin Esben-Gunnar is here. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands.
You see exits leading north, southeast, south, southwest, and northwest.

You take a long drag off your pipe.

North of New Thera (road).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A polished wooden sign is nailed to a small tree here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A dyed blue poster bearing the title "Ty Beirdd Lottery" has been hung here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. A brightly coloured hermit crab scuttles back and forth, clacking his claws. There are 2 small black cobras here. A short length of rope lies on the ground, one end of which is tied to a lump of cheese. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A dead black cobra is here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 2 guardian angels here. Quite innocently, a banana peel lies on the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock.  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is here. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. On the Prelatorian Highway (road).
A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. The ground is slick with ice. A large muddy ditch floods the road with dirty water. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground.  Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right.

A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. Dark shadows enshroud a pair of giant emerald serpent heads as they writhe, entwined atop an obsidian altar. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Sempai Fendrel Azon-Mercadia, Airborne Tiger is here.

North of New Thera (road).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A polished wooden sign is nailed to a small tree here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A dyed blue poster bearing the title "Ty Beirdd Lottery" has been hung here. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. A brightly coloured hermit crab scuttles back and forth, clacking his claws. There are 2 small black cobras here. A short length of rope lies on the ground, one end of which is tied to a lump of cheese. A dead black cobra is here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. The Champions' Bridge.
A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Averrone.

North of New Thera (road).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. A polished wooden sign is nailed to a small tree here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. A brightly coloured hermit crab scuttles back and forth, clacking his claws. There are 2 small black cobras here. A short length of rope lies on the ground, one end of which is tied to a lump of cheese. A dead black cobra is here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. A winged beast lurks in the shadows, its crimson eyes glowing brightly. Looking ready for anything, a hulking war elephant stands here. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. On the clouds (indoors).
A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Shedding its glorious luminescence, a lightweaving of a corpse resembling Bonko is suspended here. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A large wall of stone stands here, blocking passage to the up. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently.  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Atalkez al'Dejan, the Damned is riding on a Baarian tiger. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself.

A small wooden lottery box stands here. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.

6032h, 4157m, 27623e, 20103w cexkb-
The Champions' Bridge.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Hung from the western column of the arch that forms the city gates, a gilt-edged indigo scroll proudly displays the Bloodsworn decree on innocence. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. There are 2 Blackstone swordsmen here. A noble snow-white falcon glides to and fro here. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A roly-poly tiger cub romps around. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  A huge statue of the Scimitar of Yen-Sorte stands here, thrusting skywards. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed.
You see exits leading north and south.

You exert superior mental control and your wounds clot before your eyes.

6007h, 4084m, 27625e, 20070w cexkdb-
The Champions' Bridge.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Hung from the western column of the arch that forms the city gates, a gilt-edged indigo scroll proudly displays the Bloodsworn decree on innocence. There are 2 Riverwall bow-maidens here. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. There are 2 Blackstone swordsmen here. A noble snow-white falcon glides to and fro here. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A roly-poly tiger cub romps around. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  A huge statue of the Scimitar of Yen-Sorte stands here, thrusting skywards. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed.
You see exits leading north and south.

The Champions' Bridge.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. A rune that looks like something out of your nightmares has been sketched into the ground here. There are 2 guardian angels here. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground.  Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right.

A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. A rune that looks like something out of your nightmares has been sketched into the ground here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. An obsidian eye sigil is here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 2 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock.  Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is here, impassive. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading north and west.

You say, "Duanathar."
You quickly utter "Duanathar" and your wings flare with power before swiftly carrying you up to on the clouds.
On the clouds (indoors).
A rune like a lightning bolt has been sketched into the ground here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Shedding its glorious luminescence, a lightweaving of a corpse resembling Bonko is suspended here. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. The shining figure of a guardian angel floats in the air here.  Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

Crossroads near Targossas (road).
A smattering of clouds fills the sky, lacing it with spiderwebs of grey. An obsidian eye sigil is here. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A sleek pony grazes nearby. A small black cobra is flaring its hood here. There are 2 alabaster pegasi here. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 3 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 goldenseal roots in a group here. There are 3 bloodroot leaves in a group here. There are 2 pieces of kelp in a group here. Some irid moss has been left here.  The soul of Fendrel roams the land, bodiless. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. The soul of Daslin roams the land, bodiless. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed.
You see exits leading north, east, south, and west.

6032h, 4407m, 27623e, 20036w cekdb-
On the clouds (indoors).
A rune like a lightning bolt has been sketched into the ground here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Shedding its glorious luminescence, a lightweaving of a corpse resembling Bonko is suspended here. There are 2 comical jack-in-the-boxes here. There are 2 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes.  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Reonna is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right.
You see exits leading north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest, up, down, and in.

A rune like a lightning bolt has been sketched into the ground here. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. Shedding its glorious luminescence, a lightweaving of a corpse resembling Bonko is suspended here. There are 2 comical jack-in-the-boxes here. There are 2 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes.  Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Reonna is here. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right.

Before the gate of Ashtan (road).
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground.  Satiela, Scholar of Glaaki is here. She wields a cavalry shield in her right hand. Viridi Excellion is here, vines undulating about his form.
Entering the main gate of Ashtan.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A thick stone slab stained with dried blood looms here, tainting the area with the profane worship of Babel. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A furry little humgii sits here, a hungry expression in his wide eyes. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. There are 2 Shadow Amazons here. A gleaming wooden sign is posted here. Polished marble gleaming, the Effigy of Victory resides here, a testament to the favour of the Great Mother. A sentry of the Vanguard maintains his vigil, a flame-blackened bardiche planted beside him. Casually sending electricity to dance between the fingers of her iron gauntlet, a smirking War Witch of Ashtan stands guard. Encased in gold-plated armour, a knight of the Illuminati stands motionless in silent vigil. The impressive black and gold city gates of Ashtan tower above you. There are 11 Masks of the Beast here.  Assassin Cyla, The Shadowcaster is here, amusement clear in her posture. She wields a maplewood darkbow in both hands. Executioner Galvan Cobra, Administer of Death is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an iron-tipped whip in his left hand and Thoth's fang in his right. You may ENTER SUBDIVISION from here.

The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 5 Ashtani corsairs here.

The Pillars of Ashtan.

6032h, 4427m, 27625e, 19813w cexkdb-
The approach to Ashtan (road).
Everything about you is obscured by a heavy fog. Dark shadows enshroud a pair of giant emerald serpent heads as they writhe, entwined atop an obsidian altar. Resting on the ground is a cube-shaped silver sigil. A headless corpse, devoid of identity, lies here. Some irid moss has been left here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. There are 3 guardian angels here. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes.  Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Reonna is here. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading north and southwest.

6032h, 4473m, 27625e, 19709w cexkdb-
Before the gate of Ashtan (road).
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground.  Viridi Excellion is here, vines undulating about his form. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Reonna is here. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, sprawled on the floor. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands.
You see exits leading north and south.

6032h, 4463m, 27620e, 19635w cexkdb-
Entering the main gate of Ashtan.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A thick stone slab stained with dried blood looms here, tainting the area with the profane worship of Babel. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A furry little humgii sits here, a hungry expression in his wide eyes. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. There are 2 Shadow Amazons here. A gleaming wooden sign is posted here. Polished marble gleaming, the Effigy of Victory resides here, a testament to the favour of the Great Mother. A sentry of the Vanguard maintains his vigil, a flame-blackened bardiche planted beside him. Casually sending electricity to dance between the fingers of her iron gauntlet, a smirking War Witch of Ashtan stands guard. Encased in gold-plated armour, a knight of the Illuminati stands motionless in silent vigil. The impressive black and gold city gates of Ashtan tower above you. There are 11 Masks of the Beast here.  You may ENTER SUBDIVISION from here.
You see exits leading north, northeast, south, and northwest.

6032h, 4426m, 27625e, 19554w cexkdb-
Before the gate of Ashtan (road).
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A large wall of stone stands here, blocking passage to the north.  Satiela, Scholar of Glaaki is here. She wields a cavalry shield in her right hand. Viridi Excellion is here, vines undulating about his form. Reonna is here. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is riding on a giant eagle. The Golden Dragon Micaelis' imposing form looms. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. The soul of Cyla roams the land, bodiless. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right.
You see exits leading north and south.

Before the gate of Ashtan (road).
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground.  Satiela, Scholar of Glaaki is here. She wields a cavalry shield in her right hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Reonna is here. The Golden Dragon Micaelis' imposing form looms. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is riding on a giant eagle. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Viridi Excellion is here, vines undulating about his form.
You see exits leading north and south.

6032h, 4303m, 27625e, 18326w cexkdb-
Before the gate of Ashtan (road).
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A rune like a lightning bolt has been sketched into the ground here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground.  Satiela, Scholar of Glaaki is here. She wields a cavalry shield in her right hand. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. Reonna is here. She wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. The Golden Dragon Micaelis' imposing form looms. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is riding on a giant eagle. He wields a runic totem in both hands.
You see exits leading north and south.

Entering the main gate of Ashtan.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A thick stone slab stained with dried blood looms here, tainting the area with the profane worship of Babel. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A furry little humgii sits here, a hungry expression in his wide eyes. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. There are 2 Shadow Amazons here. A gleaming wooden sign is posted here. Polished marble gleaming, the Effigy of Victory resides here, a testament to the favour of the Great Mother. A sentry of the Vanguard maintains his vigil, a flame-blackened bardiche planted beside him. Casually sending electricity to dance between the fingers of her iron gauntlet, a smirking War Witch of Ashtan stands guard. Encased in gold-plated armour, a knight of the Illuminati stands motionless in silent vigil. The impressive black and gold city gates of Ashtan tower above you. There are 10 Masks of the Beast here. Before the gate of Ashtan (road).
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A rune like a lightning bolt has been sketched into the ground here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground.  Satiela, Scholar of Glaaki is here. She wields a cavalry shield in her right hand. Reonna is here. She wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He is rapidly swinging a sword above his head. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading north and south.

Entering the main gate of Ashtan.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A thick stone slab stained with dried blood looms here, tainting the area with the profane worship of Babel. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A furry little humgii sits here, a hungry expression in his wide eyes. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. There are 2 Shadow Amazons here. A gleaming wooden sign is posted here. Polished marble gleaming, the Effigy of Victory resides here, a testament to the favour of the Great Mother. A sentry of the Vanguard maintains his vigil, a flame-blackened bardiche planted beside him. Casually sending electricity to dance between the fingers of her iron gauntlet, a smirking War Witch of Ashtan stands guard. Encased in gold-plated armour, a knight of the Illuminati stands motionless in silent vigil. The impressive black and gold city gates of Ashtan tower above you. There are 10 Masks of the Beast here.  Sempai Daslin Esben-Gunnar is here. He is surrounded by a glowing white nimbus.

Entering the main gate of Ashtan.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A thick stone slab stained with dried blood looms here, tainting the area with the profane worship of Babel. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A furry little humgii sits here, a hungry expression in his wide eyes. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. There are 2 Shadow Amazons here. A gleaming wooden sign is posted here. Polished marble gleaming, the Effigy of Victory resides here, a testament to the favour of the Great Mother. A sentry of the Vanguard maintains his vigil, a flame-blackened bardiche planted beside him. Casually sending electricity to dance between the fingers of her iron gauntlet, a smirking War Witch of Ashtan stands guard. Encased in gold-plated armour, a knight of the Illuminati stands motionless in silent vigil. The impressive black and gold city gates of Ashtan tower above you. There are 10 Masks of the Beast here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground.  Reonna is here. She wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. The Golden Dragon Micaelis' imposing form looms. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is riding on a giant eagle. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading north and south.

5403h, 4342m, 27625e, 17692w cexkdb-
Entering the main gate of Ashtan.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A thick stone slab stained with dried blood looms here, tainting the area with the profane worship of Babel. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A furry little humgii sits here, a hungry expression in his wide eyes. A ladder of long, soft leaves comprises a wispy Weaver's Fern along the ground. There are 2 Shadow Amazons here. A gleaming wooden sign is posted here. Polished marble gleaming, the Effigy of Victory resides here, a testament to the favour of the Great Mother. A sentry of the Vanguard maintains his vigil, a flame-blackened bardiche planted beside him. Casually sending electricity to dance between the fingers of her iron gauntlet, a smirking War Witch of Ashtan stands guard. Encased in gold-plated armour, a knight of the Illuminati stands motionless in silent vigil. The impressive black and gold city gates of Ashtan tower above you. There are 10 Masks of the Beast here.  You may ENTER SUBDIVISION from here.
You see exits leading north, northeast, south, and northwest.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 2 guardian angels here. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. Northern Anza Street.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 3 guardian angels here. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock.  Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. Northern Anza Street.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 2 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes.  Reonna is here. Northern Anza Street.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 2 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. Upon dark, webbed wings, a small forest bat scours the area for prey.  Reonna is here. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is riding on a giant eagle. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The soul of Acrolo roams the land, bodiless. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading north and south.

Northern Anza Street.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. Upon dark, webbed wings, a small forest bat scours the area for prey. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock.  Reonna is here. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is riding on a giant eagle. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right.
You see exits leading north and south.

Northern Anza Street.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. Upon dark, webbed wings, a small forest bat scours the area for prey. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Reonna is here. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here.
You see exits leading north and south.

Northern Anza Street.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. Upon dark, webbed wings, a small forest bat scours the area for prey. There are 3 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Reonna is here. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed.
You see exits leading north and south.

The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. Northern Anza Street.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A gold-breasted falcon surveys her surroundings with an air of cool detachment. Upon dark, webbed wings, a small forest bat scours the area for prey. There are 3 guardian angels here. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. A large wall of stone stands here, blocking passage to the north. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Reonna is here. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form.
You see exits leading north and south.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 2 guardian angels here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground.  The soul of Jinsun roams the land, bodiless. Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right.
You see exits leading north and south.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. There are 2 guardian angels here. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground.  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Assassin Cyla, The Shadowcaster is here, amusement clear in her posture. She wields a maplewood darkbow in both hands. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right.

The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. 6032h, 4328m, 25900e, 13934w cexkdb-
Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
 There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. There are 2 ginseng roots in 2 groups here. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A small lobelia seed lies here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. There are 5 goldenseal roots in 5 groups here. There are 4 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. A solid, round kola nut lies here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground.  Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form.
You see exits leading north and south.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. There are 2 ginseng roots in 2 groups here. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A small lobelia seed lies here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. There are 5 goldenseal roots in 5 groups here. There are 4 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. A solid, round kola nut lies here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. There are 2 ginseng roots in 2 groups here. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A small lobelia seed lies here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. There are 5 goldenseal roots in 5 groups here. There are 4 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. A solid, round kola nut lies here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right.
You see exits leading north and south.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. There are 2 ginseng roots in 2 groups here. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A small lobelia seed lies here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. There are 5 goldenseal roots in 5 groups here. There are 4 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. A solid, round kola nut lies here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. There are 2 ginseng roots in 2 groups here. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A small lobelia seed lies here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. There are 5 goldenseal roots in 5 groups here. There are 4 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. A solid, round kola nut lies here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here.
