Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. There are 2 ginseng roots in 2 groups here. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A small lobelia seed lies here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. There are 5 goldenseal roots in 5 groups here. There are 4 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. A solid, round kola nut lies here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. There are 2 ginseng roots in 2 groups here. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A small lobelia seed lies here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. There are 5 goldenseal roots in 5 groups here. There are 4 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. A solid, round kola nut lies here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.

Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. 6032h, 4344m, 23716e, 12683w cexkdb-
Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. There are 2 ginseng roots in 2 groups here. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A small lobelia seed lies here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. There are 5 goldenseal roots in 5 groups here. There are 4 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. A solid, round kola nut lies here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right.
You see exits leading north and south.

6032h, 4473m, 23596e, 12609w cexkdb-
Anza Street near the warehouses.
The bright sun shines down, blanketing you with its life-giving warmth. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. There are 2 ginseng roots in 2 groups here. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. Some prickly ash bark has been left here. A small lobelia seed lies here. A small, ripe sileris berry lies here. There are 5 goldenseal roots in 5 groups here. There are 4 pieces of kelp in 4 groups here. A solid, round kola nut lies here. There are 2 bloodroot leaves in 2 groups here. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground.  Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right.
You see exits leading north and south.

6032h, 4450m, 23191e, 12365w cexkdb-

6032h, 4450m, 23191e, 12377w cexkdb-
Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here.
You see exits leading north and south.
6032h, 4440m, 23191e, 12377w cexkdb-
You sigh in relief as you realise the meteor is not heading for you.

6032h, 4473m, 22616e, 12042w cexkdb-
Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 2 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right.
You see exits leading north and south.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 2 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
  Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The soul of Niks roams the land, bodiless. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right.

A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
 A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground.  Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right.
You see exits leading north and south.

The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 2 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
 A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A headless corpse, devoid of identity, lies here. The twisted remains of Niks lie here.  Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 2 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. There are 3 aurum flakes in 2 groups here. A dark grey flake of plumbum sparkles upon the floor. A metallic flake of ferrum rests on the ground here, in danger of blowing away. A flake of stannum rests on the ground here, gleaming a dull silver. A grain of quartz glints upon the ground. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
 A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A headless corpse, devoid of identity, lies here. The twisted remains of Niks lie here.  Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Reonna is here. She wields Swarming Embers in her left hand. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. Anza Street circling the warehouse district.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. A fierce tiger prowls restlessly nearby.  Oathsworn Ernam is here, sleeping soundly. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. The Blue Dragon Jinsun's imposing form looms. Assassin Cyla, The Shadowcaster is here, shrouded. She wields a maplewood darkbow in both hands. Beloved Primarch Kyrra Drac'Kal, the Storm Maiden is here, faint silver scales shimmering over her form. She wields a slender parrying blade of dark-hued steel in her left hand and a graceful court-style rapier of dark-hued steel in her right. Atalkez al'Dejan, the Damned is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. The Black Dragon Jonesey's imposing form looms. The Black Dragon Acrolo's imposing form looms. Executioner Galvan Cobra, Administer of Death is here. His face is partially concealed beneath a raised hood. He wields an iron-tipped whip in his left hand and Thoth's fang in his right. Skarash Azon is here, faint red scales shimmering over his form. 6032h, 4322m, 21541e, 11530w cexkdb-
Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
 There are 2 corpses of an unformed thing of chaos here.  The soul of Ernam roams the land, bodiless. Skarash Azon is here, sprawled on the floor. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. The soul of Acrolo roams the land, bodiless. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right. Assassin Cyla, The Shadowcaster is here, sprawled on the floor. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right.
You see exits leading north and south.

5806h, 4367m, 21256e, 11378w cekdb-

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
 There are 2 corpses of an unformed thing of chaos here.  Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. The soul of Ernam roams the land, bodiless. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right.
You see exits leading north and south.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. A translucent map of Sapience shimmers in the air.
 There are 2 corpses of an unformed thing of chaos here.  Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Niks is here. 6032h, 4442m, 21026e, 11137w cexkdb-
Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A rune resembling a volcano has been sketched into the ground here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 corpses of an unformed thing of chaos here. An icewall is here, blocking passage to the south.  The soul of Ernam roams the land, bodiless. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields a runic totem in both hands. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields Ad'zeekh, Whispering Bow of the Tsol in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his left hand and a crystalline elemental shield in his right. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form.
You see exits leading north and south.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. Anza Street circling the warehouse district.

Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 corpses of an unformed thing of chaos here. The decapitated head of Acrolo has been carelessly tossed aside. The decapitated head of Cyla has been carelessly tossed aside. The twisted remains of Jonesey lie here.  Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A rune like a lightning bolt has been sketched into the ground here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 2 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 corpses of an unformed thing of chaos here. The decapitated head of Acrolo has been carelessly tossed aside. The decapitated head of Cyla has been carelessly tossed aside. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. There are 4 corpses of a whisper spiderling here. There are 4 corpses of a watch spiderling here. There are 3 corpses of a sword spider here. There are 3 corpses of a watch spider here. There are 4 corpses of a sword spiderling here. There are 3 corpses of a whisper spider here. The corpse of a giant whisper spider lies here, as silent in death as it was in life. The hulking corpse of a giant watch spider lies here, mutilated. Surrounded by eight severed limbs, the body of a menacing sword spider lies here dead. A light smudge of green indicates a pinch of malachite dusts the ground here. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground.  Reonna is here. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Lupine bow in both hands. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right.

Skarash Azon (male Human).
His date of birth is hidden by the sand of Aeon.
He is ranked 88th in Achaea.
He is an extremely credible character.
He is not known for acts of infamy.
He is a Praetor in Ashtan.
He is considered to be approximately 120% of your might.
He is a mentor and able to take on proteges.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A rune like a lightning bolt has been sketched into the ground here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 2 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 2 corpses of an unformed thing of chaos here. The decapitated head of Acrolo has been carelessly tossed aside. The decapitated head of Cyla has been carelessly tossed aside. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. There are 4 corpses of a whisper spiderling here. There are 4 corpses of a watch spiderling here. There are 3 corpses of a sword spider here. There are 3 corpses of a watch spider here. There are 4 corpses of a sword spiderling here. There are 3 corpses of a whisper spider here. The corpse of a giant whisper spider lies here, as silent in death as it was in life. The hulking corpse of a giant watch spider lies here, mutilated. Surrounded by eight severed limbs, the body of a menacing sword spider lies here dead. A light smudge of green indicates a pinch of malachite dusts the ground here. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground.  Reonna is here. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here. He wields an ornate steel rapier in his left hand and an ornate steel rapier marred with char marks in his right. He is surrounded by one reflection of himself. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading north and south.

Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A rune like a lightning bolt has been sketched into the ground here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. Great waves of heat radiate from a metal tank, a torrent of flames raging within. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. There are 2 corpses of an unformed thing of chaos here. The decapitated head of Acrolo has been carelessly tossed aside. The decapitated head of Cyla has been carelessly tossed aside. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. There are 4 corpses of a whisper spiderling here. There are 4 corpses of a watch spiderling here. There are 3 corpses of a sword spider here. There are 3 corpses of a watch spider here. There are 4 corpses of a sword spiderling here. There are 3 corpses of a whisper spider here. The corpse of a giant whisper spider lies here, as silent in death as it was in life. The hulking corpse of a giant watch spider lies here, mutilated. Surrounded by eight severed limbs, the body of a menacing sword spider lies here dead. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 4 green inks in 4 groups here.  The soul of Atalkez roams the land, bodiless. The soul of Daslin roams the land, bodiless. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Reonna is here. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. The soul of Acrolo roams the land, bodiless. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is here, sprawled on the floor. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right.

6032h, 4322m, 19397e, 10089w cexkdb-
The ruins of Anza Street near the warehouses.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. A rune like a lightning bolt has been sketched into the ground here. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Antlers of jet black crown the head of a proud ivory peryton. A noble hippogriff flaps its wings in agitation here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A small forest of sharpened crystals protrudes from the ground. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. There are 2 corpses of an unformed thing of chaos here. The decapitated head of Acrolo has been carelessly tossed aside. The decapitated head of Cyla has been carelessly tossed aside. Standing still as a statue, a blood steed has fixed its fiery red eyes on some movement in the distance. There are 4 corpses of a whisper spiderling here. There are 4 corpses of a watch spiderling here. There are 3 corpses of a sword spider here. There are 3 corpses of a watch spider here. There are 4 corpses of a sword spiderling here. There are 3 corpses of a whisper spider here. The corpse of a giant whisper spider lies here, as silent in death as it was in life. The hulking corpse of a giant watch spider lies here, mutilated. Surrounded by eight severed limbs, the body of a menacing sword spider lies here dead. A brightly coloured jack-in-the-box rests quietly on the ground. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. There are 4 green inks in 4 groups here. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes. The decapitated head of Jonesey has been carelessly tossed aside.  Reonna is here. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is riding on a giant eagle. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Niks is here. He wields a spiritual mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption in his right. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand.
You see exits leading north and south.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. There are 2 noble hippogriffs here. A small wooden lottery box stands here. There are 2 guardian angels here. A stubborn mule wanders about here, nosing at the ground. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock. Spreading its majestic golden wings, a giant eagle searches the ground with piercing eyes.  Reonna is here. Soldier Caladbolg Van Helsing is riding on a stubborn mule. He wields a Delosian bastard sword in both hands. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Aelios Azon, Blade of the Watch is riding on a giant eagle. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands. Mithridates Eupator Dionysius is here. He wields a crystalline elemental shield in his left hand and a roughly-hewn crystalline staff in his right.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.

A bustling farrier's yard.
The stars twinkle in the clear night sky. Humming under his breath, Mahmoud toils over his tools. A sleek pony grazes nearby. Eyes keenly raised to the skies, a cowled bow-maiden plucks idly at her bowstring. A runic totem is planted solidly in the ground. Gripping a broadsword, a Shornwall defender crouches slightly in anticipation. Lambent energy pulses around the skeletal frame of a Naxian mistweaver. An attentive Duskmere brawler stands ready with his halberd, his keen eyes missing nothing. Poised for action, a Blackstone swordsman observes the surrounds. There are 2 noble hippogriffs here. A small wooden lottery box stands here. There are 3 guardian angels here. Wings flaring, a pegasus tosses his regal head impatiently. A giant tortoise sits here like a rock.  Phaestean Wordsmith, Silvarien Da'Navi is here. He wields a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Phaestus in his right hand. Predicant Carmell Bayt Al-Azhan, Caefir Priestess is riding on a noble hippogriff. She wields a bronze mace wreathed in flame in her left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in her right. Halos Vorondil, Herald of Redemption is riding on a giant tortoise. He wields a Raphaelan mace in his left hand and a Shield of Absorption bearing the Divine Order arms of Deucalion in his right. Micaelis Bayt Al-Azhan, Sefyric Prince is here, golden scales faintly shimmering over his form. Sir Morthif Aristata, Knight of the Watch is riding on an alabaster pegasus. He wields an ornate steel rapier in each hand. Predicant Garis 'The Jinx' Obuun is here. Reonna is here. Oathsworn Ernam is here, calm and relaxed. He wields a ranger's bow in both hands.
You see exits leading north, west, and northwest.
